title: Duvan Ricardo Sanchez | Portafolio
description: Soy Neo, posiblemente el mejor programador de la historia.
name: Duvan Ricardo Sanchez
about: I am a RPA developer with around 4 years of experience in process automation, committed to continuous learning and passionate about innovation. I consider myself responsible and competent in collaborative work, with skills in change management, vision, and strategic planning oriented towards achieving objectives and continuous improvement. Each project is an opportunity to apply these skills and contribute to the team's success. My focus on process automation is combined with my commitment to excellence and continuous evolution, always seeking to overcome challenges with innovative and strategic solutions.

items_Description: Design, develop and implement robotic process automation solutions using UiPath,VB.Net, Power Apss and Power Automate tools.
Analyze and evaluate automation workflows to identify opportunities for improvement.
Test and debug automation solutions to ensure functionality and reliability. Collaborate with team members to find solutions to problems.
Provide technical support and troubleshoot issues related to RPA implementations.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate RPA solutions with existing systems.
Document RPA processes, Solution Design Document (SDD) and Process Definition Document (PDD)
Design, develop and test automation workflows using UiPath
Deploy RPA components: bots, robots, development tools, among others
Support the implementation of RPA solutions
Ensure the quality of automation (QA processes)
